snippet: Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it had appointed two senior investment bankers, Craig Reisser and Miguel Azevedo, to expand its business in Africa.
abstract: Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it had appointed two senior investment bankers, Craig Reisser and Miguel Azevedo, to expand its business in Africa.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it had appointed two senior investment bankers to expand its business in Africa.

headline.main: Citigroup Appoints Two Senior Bankers in Africa
